title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of purple cut and uncut velvet on cream-colored satin ground. Design of horizontal rows of rose branches with foliage and flowers, alternate rows facing left and right.
